name: com.sun.jarsigner
des: This package comprises the interfaces and classes used to define the signing mechanism used by the jarsigner tool.

name: com.sun.java.accessibility.util
des: Provides a collection of interfaces and classes that compose the Java Accessibility Utilities.

name: com.sun.jdi
des: This is the core package of the Java Debug Interface (JDI), it defines mirrors for values, types, and the target VirtualMachine itself - as well bootstrapping facilities.

name: com.sun.jdi.connect
des: This package defines connections between the virtual machine using the JDI and the target virtual machine.

name: com.sun.jdi.connect.spi
des: This package comprises the interfaces and classes used to develop new TransportService implementations.

name: com.sun.jdi.event
des: This package defines JDI events and event processing.

name: com.sun.jdi.request
des: This package is used to request that a JDI event be sent under specified conditions.

name: com.sun.management
des: This package contains the JDK's extension to the standard implementation of the java.lang.management API and also defines the management interface for some other components of the platform.

name: com.sun.net.httpserver
des: Provides a simple high-level Http server API, which can be used to build embedded HTTP servers.

name: com.sun.net.httpserver.spi
des: Provides a pluggable service provider interface, which allows the HTTP server implementation to be replaced with other implementations.

name: com.sun.nio.sctp
des: A Java API for Stream Control Transport Protocol.

name: com.sun.security.auth
des: Provides implementations of Principal.

name: com.sun.security.auth.callback
des: Provides an implementation of CallbackHandler.

name: com.sun.security.auth.login
des: Provides an implementation of Configuration.

name: com.sun.security.auth.module
des: Provides implementations of LoginModule.

name: com.sun.security.jgss
des: This package defines classes and interfaces for the JDK extensions to the GSS-API.

name: com.sun.source.doctree
des: Provides interfaces to represent documentation comments as abstract syntax trees (AST).

name: com.sun.source.tree
des: Provides interfaces to represent source code as abstract syntax trees (AST).

name: com.sun.source.util
des: Provides utilities for operations on abstract syntax trees (AST).

name: com.sun.tools.attach
des: Provides the API to attach to a Java virtual machine.

name: com.sun.tools.attach.spi
des: Only developers who are defining new attach providers should need to make direct use of this package.

name: com.sun.tools.javac
des: This package provides a legacy entry point for the javac tool.

name: com.sun.tools.jconsole
des: This package contains the JConsole API.

name: java.applet
des: Provides the classes necessary to create an applet and the classes an applet uses to communicate with its applet context.

name: java.awt
des: Contains all of the classes for creating user interfaces and for painting graphics and images.

name: java.awt.color
des: Provides classes for color spaces.

name: java.awt.datatransfer
des: Provides interfaces and classes for transferring data between and within applications.

name: java.awt.desktop
des: Provides interfaces and classes for interaction with various desktop capabilities.

name: java.awt.dnd
des: Drag and Drop is a direct manipulation gesture found in many Graphical User Interface systems that provides a mechanism to transfer information between two entities logically associated with presentation elements in the GUI.

name: java.awt.event
des: Provides interfaces and classes for dealing with different types of events fired by AWT components.

name: java.awt.font
des: Provides classes and interface relating to fonts.

name: java.awt.geom
des: Provides the Java 2D classes for defining and performing operations on objects related to two-dimensional geometry.

name: java.awt.im
des: Provides classes and interfaces for the input method framework.

name: java.awt.im.spi
des: Provides interfaces that enable the development of input methods that can be used with any Java runtime environment.

name: java.awt.image
des: Provides classes for creating and modifying images.

name: java.awt.image.renderable
des: Provides classes and interfaces for producing rendering-independent images.

name: java.awt.print
des: Provides classes and interfaces for a general printing API.

name: java.beans
des: Contains classes related to developing beans -- components based on the JavaBeans architecture.

name: java.beans.beancontext
des: Provides classes and interfaces relating to bean context.

name: java.io
des: Provides for system input and output through data streams, serialization and the file system.

name: java.lang
des: Provides classes that are fundamental to the design of the Java programming language.

name: java.lang.annotation
des: Provides library support for the Java programming language annotation facility.

name: java.lang.constant
des: Classes and interfaces to represent nominal descriptors for run-time entities such as classes or method handles, and classfile entities such as constant pool entries or invokedynamic call sites.

name: java.lang.instrument
des: Provides services that allow Java programming language agents to instrument programs running on the JVM.

name: java.lang.invoke
des: The java.lang.invoke package provides low-level primitives for interacting with the Java Virtual Machine.

name: java.lang.management
des: Provides the management interfaces for monitoring and management of the Java virtual machine and other components in the Java runtime.

name: java.lang.module
des: Classes to support module descriptors and creating configurations of modules by means of resolution and service binding.

name: java.lang.ref
des: Provides reference-object classes, which support a limited degree of interaction with the garbage collector.

name: java.lang.reflect
des: Provides classes and interfaces for obtaining reflective information about classes and objects.

name: java.lang.runtime
des: The java.lang.runtime package provides low-level runtime support for the Java language.

name: java.math
des: Provides classes for performing arbitrary-precision integer arithmetic (BigInteger) and arbitrary-precision decimal arithmetic (BigDecimal).

name: java.net
des: Provides the classes for implementing networking applications.

name: java.net.http
des: HTTP Client and WebSocket APIs

name: java.net.spi
des: Service-provider classes for the java.net package.

name: java.nio
des: Defines buffers, which are containers for data, and provides an overview of the other NIO packages.

name: java.nio.channels
des: Defines channels, which represent connections to entities that are capable of performing I/O operations, such as files and sockets; defines selectors, for multiplexed, non-blocking I/O operations.

name: java.nio.channels.spi
des: Service-provider classes for the java.nio.channels package.

name: java.nio.charset
des: Defines charsets, decoders, and encoders, for translating between bytes and Unicode characters.

name: java.nio.charset.spi
des: Service-provider classes for the java.nio.charset package.

name: java.nio.file
des: Defines interfaces and classes for the Java virtual machine to access files, file attributes, and file systems.

name: java.nio.file.attribute
des: Interfaces and classes providing access to file and file system attributes.

name: java.nio.file.spi
des: Service-provider classes for the java.nio.file package.

name: java.rmi
des: Provides the RMI package.

name: java.rmi.dgc
des: Provides classes and interface for RMI distributed garbage-collection (DGC).

name: java.rmi.registry
des: Provides a class and two interfaces for the RMI registry.

name: java.rmi.server
des: Provides classes and interfaces for supporting the server side of RMI.

name: java.security
des: Provides the classes and interfaces for the security framework.

name: java.security.cert
des: Provides classes and interfaces for parsing and managing certificates, certificate revocation lists (CRLs), and certification paths.

name: java.security.interfaces
des: Provides interfaces for generating RSA (Rivest, Shamir and Adleman AsymmetricCipher algorithm) keys as defined in the RSA Laboratory Technical Note PKCS#1, and DSA (Digital Signature Algorithm) keys as defined in NIST's FIPS-186.

name: java.security.spec
des: Provides classes and interfaces for key specifications and algorithm parameter specifications.

name: java.sql
des: Provides the API for accessing and processing data stored in a data source (usually a relational database) using the Java programming language.

name: java.text
des: Provides classes and interfaces for handling text, dates, numbers, and messages in a manner independent of natural languages.

name: java.text.spi
des: Service provider classes for the classes in the java.text package.

name: java.time
des: The main API for dates, times, instants, and durations.

name: java.time.chrono
des: Generic API for calendar systems other than the default ISO.

name: java.time.format
des: Provides classes to print and parse dates and times.

name: java.time.temporal
des: Access to date and time using fields and units, and date time adjusters.

name: java.time.zone
des: Support for time-zones and their rules.

name: java.util
des: Contains the collections framework, some internationalization support classes, a service loader, properties, random number generation, string parsing and scanning classes, base64 encoding and decoding, a bit array, and several miscellaneous utility classes.

name: java.util.concurrent
des: Utility classes commonly useful in concurrent programming.

name: java.util.concurrent.atomic
des: A small toolkit of classes that support lock-free thread-safe programming on single variables.

name: java.util.concurrent.locks
des: Interfaces and classes providing a framework for locking and waiting for conditions that is distinct from built-in synchronization and monitors.

name: java.util.function
des: Functional interfaces provide target types for lambda expressions and method references.

name: java.util.jar
des: Provides classes for reading and writing the JAR (Java ARchive) file format, which is based on the standard ZIP file format with an optional manifest file.

name: java.util.logging
des: Provides the classes and interfaces of the Java 2 platform's core logging facilities.

name: java.util.prefs
des: This package allows applications to store and retrieve user and system preference and configuration data.

name: java.util.random
des: This package contains classes and interfaces that support a generic API for random number generation.

name: java.util.regex
des: Classes for matching character sequences against patterns specified by regular expressions.

name: java.util.spi
des: Service provider classes for the classes in the java.util package.

name: java.util.stream
des: Classes to support functional-style operations on streams of elements, such as map-reduce transformations on collections.

name: java.util.zip
des: Provides classes for reading and writing the standard ZIP and GZIP file formats.

name: javax.accessibility
des: Defines a contract between user-interface components and an assistive technology that provides access to those components.

name: javax.annotation.processing
des: Facilities for declaring annotation processors and for allowing annotation processors to communicate with an annotation processing tool environment.

name: javax.crypto
des: Provides the classes and interfaces for cryptographic operations.

name: javax.crypto.interfaces
des: Provides interfaces for Diffie-Hellman keys as defined in RSA Laboratories' PKCS #3.

name: javax.crypto.spec
des: Provides classes and interfaces for key specifications and algorithm parameter specifications.

name: javax.imageio
des: The main package of the Java Image I/O API.

name: javax.imageio.event
des: A package of the Java Image I/O API dealing with synchronous notification of events during the reading and writing of images.

name: javax.imageio.metadata
des: A package of the Java Image I/O API dealing with reading and writing metadata.

name: javax.imageio.plugins.bmp
des: Package containing the public classes used by the built-in BMP plug-in.

name: javax.imageio.plugins.jpeg
des: Classes supporting the built-in JPEG plug-in.

name: javax.imageio.plugins.tiff
des: Public classes used by the built-in TIFF plug-ins.

name: javax.imageio.spi
des: A package of the Java Image I/O API containing the plug-in interfaces for readers, writers, transcoders, and streams, and a runtime registry.

name: javax.imageio.stream
des: A package of the Java Image I/O API dealing with low-level I/O from files and streams.

name: javax.lang.model
des: Types and hierarchies of packages comprising a Java language model, a model of the declarations and types of the Java programming language.

name: javax.lang.model.element
des: Interfaces used to model elements of the Java programming language.

name: javax.lang.model.type
des: Interfaces used to model Java programming language types.

name: javax.lang.model.util
des: Utilities to assist in the processing of program elements and types.

name: javax.management
des: Provides the core classes for the Java Management Extensions.

name: javax.management.loading
des: Provides the classes which implement advanced dynamic loading.

name: javax.management.modelmbean
des: Provides the definition of the ModelMBean classes.

name: javax.management.monitor
des: Provides the definition of the monitor classes.

name: javax.management.openmbean
des: Provides the open data types and Open MBean descriptor classes.

name: javax.management.relation
des: Provides the definition of the Relation Service.

name: javax.management.remote
des: Interfaces for remote access to JMX MBean servers.

name: javax.management.remote.rmi
des: The RMI connector is a connector for the JMX Remote API that uses RMI to transmit client requests to a remote MBean server.

name: javax.management.timer
des: Provides the definition of the Timer MBean.

name: javax.naming
des: Provides the classes and interfaces for accessing naming services.

name: javax.naming.directory
des: Extends the javax.naming package to provide functionality for accessing directory services.

name: javax.naming.event
des: Provides support for event notification when accessing naming and directory services.

name: javax.naming.ldap
des: Provides support for LDAPv3 extended operations and controls.

name: javax.naming.spi
des: Provides the means for dynamically plugging in support for accessing naming and directory services through the javax.naming and related packages.

name: javax.net
des: Provides classes for networking applications.

name: javax.net.ssl
des: Provides classes for the secure socket package.

name: javax.print
des: Provides the principal classes and interfaces for the Java Print Service API.

name: javax.print.attribute
des: Provides classes and interfaces that describe the types of Java Print Service attributes and how they can be collected into attribute sets.

name: javax.print.attribute.standard
des: Package javax.print.attribute.standard contains classes for specific printing attributes.

name: javax.print.event
des: Package javax.print.event contains event classes and listener interfaces.

name: javax.rmi.ssl
des: Provides implementations of RMIClientSocketFactory and RMIServerSocketFactory over the Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) or Transport Layer Security (TLS) protocols.

name: javax.script
des: The scripting API consists of interfaces and classes that define Java Scripting Engines and provides a framework for their use in Java applications.

name: javax.security.auth
des: This package provides a framework for authentication and authorization.

name: javax.security.auth.callback
des: This package provides the classes necessary for services to interact with applications in order to retrieve information (authentication data including usernames or passwords, for example) or to display information (error and warning messages, for example).

name: javax.security.auth.kerberos
des: This package contains utility classes related to the Kerberos network authentication protocol.

name: javax.security.auth.login
des: This package provides a pluggable authentication framework.

name: javax.security.auth.spi
des: This package provides the interface to be used for implementing pluggable authentication modules.

name: javax.security.auth.x500
des: This package contains the classes that should be used to store X500 Principal and X500 Private Credentials in a Subject.

name: javax.security.cert
des: Provides classes for public key certificates.

name: javax.security.sasl
des: Contains class and interfaces for supporting SASL.

name: javax.smartcardio
des: Java™ Smart Card I/O API.

name: javax.sound.midi
des: Provides interfaces and classes for I/O, sequencing, and synthesis of MIDI (Musical Instrument Digital Interface) data.

name: javax.sound.midi.spi
des: Supplies interfaces for service providers to implement when offering new MIDI devices, MIDI file readers and writers, or sound bank readers.

name: javax.sound.sampled
des: Provides interfaces and classes for capture, processing, and playback of sampled audio data.

name: javax.sound.sampled.spi
des: Supplies abstract classes for service providers to subclass when offering new audio devices, sound file readers and writers, or audio format converters.

name: javax.sql
des: Provides the API for server side data source access and processing from the Java programming language.

name: javax.sql.rowset
des: Standard interfaces and base classes for JDBC RowSet implementations.

name: javax.sql.rowset.serial
des: Provides utility classes to allow serializable mappings between SQL types and data types in the Java programming language.

name: javax.sql.rowset.spi
des: The standard classes and interfaces that a third party vendor has to use in its implementation of a synchronization provider.

name: javax.swing
des: Provides a set of "lightweight" (all-Java language) components that, to the maximum degree possible, work the same on all platforms.

name: javax.swing.border
des: Provides classes and interface for drawing specialized borders around a Swing component.

name: javax.swing.colorchooser
des: Contains classes and interfaces used by the JColorChooser component.

name: javax.swing.event
des: Provides for events fired by Swing components.

name: javax.swing.filechooser
des: Contains classes and interfaces used by the JFileChooser component.

name: javax.swing.plaf
des: Provides one interface and many abstract classes that Swing uses to provide its pluggable look-and-feel capabilities.

name: javax.swing.plaf.basic
des: Provides user interface objects built according to the Basic look and feel.

name: javax.swing.plaf.metal
des: Provides user interface objects built according to the Java look and feel (once codenamed Metal), which is the default look and feel.

name: javax.swing.plaf.multi
des: Provides user interface objects that combine two or more look and feels.

name: javax.swing.plaf.nimbus
des: Provides user interface objects built according to the cross-platform Nimbus look and feel.

name: javax.swing.plaf.synth
des: Synth is a skinnable look and feel in which all painting is delegated.

name: javax.swing.table
des: Provides classes and interfaces for dealing with javax.swing.JTable.

name: javax.swing.text
des: Provides classes and interfaces that deal with editable and noneditable text components.

name: javax.swing.text.html
des: Provides the class HTMLEditorKit and supporting classes for creating HTML text editors.

name: javax.swing.text.html.parser
des: Provides the default HTML parser, along with support classes.

name: javax.swing.text.rtf
des: Provides a class (RTFEditorKit) for creating Rich-Text-Format text editors.

name: javax.swing.tree
des: Provides classes and interfaces for dealing with javax.swing.JTree.

name: javax.swing.undo
des: Allows developers to provide support for undo/redo in applications such as text editors.

name: javax.tools
des: Provides interfaces for tools which can be invoked from a program, for example, compilers.

name: javax.transaction.xa
des: Provides the API that defines the contract between the transaction manager and the resource manager, which allows the transaction manager to enlist and delist resource objects (supplied by the resource manager driver) in JTA transactions.

name: javax.xml
des: Defines constants for XML processing.

name: javax.xml.catalog
des: Provides the classes for implementing XML Catalogs OASIS Standard V1.1, 7 October 2005.

name: javax.xml.crypto
des: Common classes for XML cryptography.

name: javax.xml.crypto.dom
des: DOM-specific classes for the javax.xml.crypto package.

name: javax.xml.crypto.dsig
des: Classes for generating and validating XML digital signatures.

name: javax.xml.crypto.dsig.dom
des: DOM-specific classes for the javax.xml.crypto.dsig package.

name: javax.xml.crypto.dsig.keyinfo
des: Classes for parsing and processing KeyInfo elements and structures.

name: javax.xml.crypto.dsig.spec
des: Parameter classes for XML digital signatures.

name: javax.xml.datatype
des: Defines XML/Java Type Mappings.

name: javax.xml.namespace
des: Defines XML Namespace processing.

name: javax.xml.parsers
des: Provides the classes for processing XML documents with a SAX (Simple API for XML) parser or a DOM (Document Object Model) Document builder.

name: javax.xml.stream
des: Defines interfaces and classes for the Streaming API for XML (StAX).

name: javax.xml.stream.events
des: Defines event interfaces for the Streaming API for XML (StAX).

name: javax.xml.stream.util
des: Provides utility classes for the Streaming API for XML (StAX).

name: javax.xml.transform
des: Defines the generic APIs for processing transformation instructions, and performing a transformation from source to result.

name: javax.xml.transform.dom
des: Provides DOM specific transformation classes.

name: javax.xml.transform.sax
des: Provides SAX specific transformation classes.

name: javax.xml.transform.stax
des: Provides StAX specific transformation classes.

name: javax.xml.transform.stream
des: Provides stream and URI specific transformation classes.

name: javax.xml.validation
des: Provides an API for validation of XML documents.

name: javax.xml.xpath
des: Provides an object-model neutral API for the evaluation of XPath expressions and access to the evaluation environment.

name: jdk.dynalink
des: Contains interfaces and classes that are used to link an invokedynamic call site.

name: jdk.dynalink.beans
des: Contains the linker for ordinary Java objects.

name: jdk.dynalink.linker
des: Contains interfaces and classes needed by language runtimes to implement their own language-specific object models and type conversions.

name: jdk.dynalink.linker.support
des: Contains classes that make it more convenient for language runtimes to implement their own language-specific object models and type conversions by providing basic implementations of some classes as well as various utilities.

name: jdk.dynalink.support
des: Contains classes that make using Dynalink more convenient by providing basic implementations of some classes as well as various utilities.

name: jdk.incubator.foreign
des: Classes to support low-level and efficient foreign memory/function access, directly from Java.

name: jdk.incubator.vector
des: Incubating Feature. Will be removed in a future release.

name: jdk.javadoc.doclet
des: The Doclet API provides an environment which, in conjunction with the Language Model API and Compiler Tree API, allows clients to inspect the source-level structures of programs and libraries, including API comments embedded in the source.

name: jdk.jfr
des: This package provides classes to create events and control Flight Recorder.

name: jdk.jfr.consumer
des: This package contains classes for consuming Flight Recorder data.

name: jdk.jshell
des: Provides interfaces for creating tools, such as a Read-Eval-Print Loop (REPL), which interactively evaluate "snippets" of Java programming language code.

name: jdk.jshell.execution
des: Provides implementation support for building JShell execution engines.

name: jdk.jshell.spi
des: Defines the Service Provider Interface for pluggable JShell execution engines.

name: jdk.jshell.tool
des: Provides a mechanism to launch an instance of a Java shell tool.

name: jdk.management.jfr
des: This package contains classes to control and monitor Flight Recorder over Java Management Extensions (JMX).

name: jdk.net
des: Platform specific socket options for the java.net and java.nio.channels socket classes.

name: jdk.nio
des: Defines JDK-specific channel APIs.

name: jdk.security.jarsigner
des: This package defines APIs for signing jar files.

name: netscape.javascript
des: Provides Java code the ability to access the JavaScript engine and the HTML DOM in the web browser.

name: org.ietf.jgss
des: This package presents a framework that allows application developers to make use of security services like authentication, data integrity and data confidentiality from a variety of underlying security mechanisms like Kerberos, using a unified API.

name: org.w3c.dom
des: Provides the interfaces for the Document Object Model (DOM).

name: org.w3c.dom.bootstrap
des: Provides a factory for obtaining instances of DOMImplementation.

name: org.w3c.dom.css
des: Provides interfaces for DOM Level 2 Style Specification.

name: org.w3c.dom.events
des: Provides interfaces for DOM Level 2 Events.

name: org.w3c.dom.html
des: Provides interfaces for DOM Level 2 HTML Specification.

name: org.w3c.dom.ls
des: Provides interfaces for DOM Level 3 Load and Save.

name: org.w3c.dom.ranges
des: Provides interfaces for DOM Level 2 Range.

name: org.w3c.dom.stylesheets
des: Provides interfaces for DOM Level 2 Style Specification.

name: org.w3c.dom.traversal
des: Provides interfaces for DOM Level 2 Traversal.

name: org.w3c.dom.views
des: Provides interfaces for DOM Level 2 Views.

name: org.w3c.dom.xpath
des: Provides interfaces for DOM Level 3 XPath Specification.

name: org.xml.sax
des: Provides the interfaces for the Simple API for XML (SAX).

name: org.xml.sax.ext
des: Provides interfaces to SAX2 facilities that conformant SAX drivers won't necessarily support.

name: org.xml.sax.helpers
des: Provides helper classes, including support for bootstrapping SAX-based applications.
